media.headline: Healy's solo homer
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Healy opens the scoring with a solo dinger
media.bigblurb: Ryon Healy smashes a ball over the center-field fence in the bottom of the 1st inning, giving the A's an early 1-0 lead

media.headline: Shoemaker strikes out Vogt
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Shoemaker gets Vogt to chase strike three
media.bigblurb: Matt Shoemaker whiffs Stephen Vogt in the bottom of the 1st inning for his first strikeout of the season

media.headline: Maldonado's two-run single
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Maldonado drives in a pair with a base hit
media.bigblurb: Martin Maldonado delivers a clutch single with the bases loaded, chasing home two runners to give the Angels a 2-1 lead in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Escobar's RBI single
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Escobar extends the Angels' lead with single
media.bigblurb: Yunel Escobar shoots a line drive through the left side of the infield, driving home a run and giving the Angels a 3-1 lead in the 2nd

media.headline: Lowrie's solo home run
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Lowrie brings A's within one with solo shot
media.bigblurb: Jed Lowrie goes yard to right field, cutting the A's deficit to 3-2 in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Escobar's great diving stop
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Escobar robs Plouffe with a diving play
media.bigblurb: Yunel Escobar ranges to his left and makes a great diving play on a ground ball, firing to first to rob Trevor Plouffe of a hit in the 2nd

media.headline: Manaea strikes out Pujols
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Manaea freezes Pujols for a strikeout
media.bigblurb: Sean Manaea notches his first strikeout of the season, catching Albert Pujols looking in the top of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Maybin's first hit as an Angel
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Maybin singles for his first hit with Angels
media.bigblurb: Cameron Maybin sends a grounder back up the middle and into center field in the top of the 2nd inning, recording his first hit as an Angel

media.headline: Maldonado picks off Semien
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Maldonado throws behind Semien for a pickoff
media.bigblurb: Martin Maldonado snaps a throw to first base after a pitch, catching Marcus Semien too far off the bag for a pick off in the 2nd inning

media.headline: Maldonado throws out Davis
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Maldonado catches Davis trying to steal
media.bigblurb: Martin Maldonado delivers a perfect throw to second base, nabbing Rajai Davis as he tries to steal in the bottom of the 3rd inning

media.headline: Trout's RBI triple
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Trout triples to left field to extend lead
media.bigblurb: Mike Trout yanks a ground ball down the left-field line, racing to third and driving in a run in the process to give the Angels a 4-2 lead

media.headline: Young fan makes a nice catch
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: A youngster makes a nice snag on a foul ball
media.bigblurb: A young fan shows off some impressive athleticism in Oakland, reaching up to make a nice catch on a foul ball in the 6th inning

media.headline: Alonso's RBI single
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Alonso produces a base hit to drive in a run
media.bigblurb: Yonder Alonso grounds a ball up the middle and into center field, chasing home a run to cut the Angels' lead to 4-3 in the bottom of the 7th

media.headline: Davis' go-ahead triple
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Davis' triple, Angels' error gives A's lead
media.bigblurb: Rajai Davis triples down the right-field line to drive in a pair, then scores on a throwing error to give the A's a 6-4 lead in the 7th

media.headline: A's turn big double play
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: A's spin a double play to end top of the 8th
media.bigblurb: Ryan Madson induces a ground ball from Albert Pujols, which the Athletics' infield turns into a 5-4-3 double play to end the top of the 8th

media.headline: Calhoun's spectacular catch
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Calhoun lays out to rob Lowrie of a hit
media.bigblurb: Kole Calhoun makes an incredible diving catch in right field to deprive Jed Lowrie of extra bases in the bottom of the 8th inning

media.headline: Espinosa's go-ahead blast
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Espinosa homers to give Angels lead in 9th
media.bigblurb: Danny Espinosa crushes a three-run homer to right-center in the top of the 9th, turning a 6-4 deficit into a 7-6 Angels' lead

media.headline: Bedrosian finishes off save
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Bedrosian secures the win for the Angels
media.bigblurb: Cam Bedrosian yields a ground ball from Rajai Davis, earning the save in the Angels' 7-6 victory over the A's

media.headline: Espinosa on big win
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Espinosa discusses his big homer, late win
media.bigblurb: Danny Espinosa talks about the game, including his 9th-inning homer that gave the Angels a 7-6 lead they would not relinquish

media.headline: Statcast: Calhoun's diving catch
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Calhoun sprints 57 feet to make diving catch
media.bigblurb: Angels outfielder Kole Calhoun runs 57 feet to make a diving catch on a line drive with a 65% hit probability

media.headline: Melvin on loss to Angels
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Melvin on late loss to Angels
media.bigblurb: Athletics manager Bob Melvin discusses his team giving up a late three-run home run to fall to the Angels

media.headline: 4/4/17 CG: LAA@OAK
media.blurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: LAA@OAK
media.bigblurb: 4/4/17 Condensed Game: LAA@OAK

media.headline: Recap: LAA 7, OAK 6
media.blurb: 4/4/17: Espinosa's late homer propels Angels to win
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Danny Espinosa came up clutch with a three-run homer in the top of the 9th to lead the Angels to a 7-6 victory over the A's

media.headline: Statcast: Maldonado nabs Davis
media.blurb: LAA@OAK: Statcast tracks Maldonado's throw to second
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures backstop Martin Maldonado's 87-mph throw, catching Athletics speedster Rajai Davis attempting to steal second

media.headline: Scioscia on hard-fought win
media.blurb: OAK@LAA: Scioscia talks Shoemaker, Angels' tenacity
media.bigblurb: Angels manager Mike Scioscia talks about Matt Shoemaker's rough start and the team's ability to survive against the Athletics
